results.title: The role of presynaptic beta-receptors in Raynaud's disease.
results.text_hl: It is shown that the paradoxical vasoconstriction response to ISP infusion can be prevented in @<m>DISEASE_Immunoglobulin_G4_Related_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077733 @@@RD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ by the acute administration of Beta-blocker, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@DL Propranolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Brotzu G, Carboni MG, Falchi S, Montisci R, Petruzzo P. The role of presynaptic beta-receptors in Raynaud's disease. Artery. 1985;13(2):77-86. PMID: 3002305
